name: Sangam
desc: Sangam is a comprehensive community platform connecting residents and local businesses. It offers real-time chat, short-form video sharing, and a hyperlocal e-commerce module for local firms to sell directly to residents.

name: Green Cart
desc: Green Cart is a web-based grocery e-commerce platform offering a wide range of fresh products with easy online payment and order management.

name: E-cart Api
desc: A clean and modular RESTful API built with Express.js and MongoDB for powering e-commerce platforms. Handles everything from user auth to product, cart, and order management, ready to plug into any frontend.
